content.text: Draw the line of symmetry on this shape

You must show all your working
Insert one pair of brackets into this statement to make it correct
\(\mathbf{a} = \begin{pmatrix} 5 \\ - 7 \end{pmatrix}\) \(\mathbf{b} = \begin{pmatrix} - 2 \\ 6 \end{pmatrix}\)
Work out \(\mathbf{a} - \mathbf{b}\)

add to \(-4\) to give an answer of 9,
subtract from \(-9\) to give an answer of \(-4\)

The bar chart shows the marks scored by a group of 55 students in an examination
Work out the percentage of this group of students who scored marks from 21 to 80

Find the probability that Jane does not win the game
Calculate \(\sqrt[4]{0.0256}\)

Key: \(2 \mid 0 = 20\) minutes
Complete the table
Complete these statements
The reciprocal of 0.2 is

Find the value of \(x\) when \(7^{x} \div 7^{4} = 7^{9}\)
Henrik draws this scatter diagram
Put a ring around the one correct statement about this scatter diagram
It shows
no correlation
It is not possible to tell if
there is correlation as there
are not enough points
It shows negative
correlation
It shows positive
correlation
Each of the four scatter diagrams shows the same set of data
A line has been drawn on each diagram
Complete the statement
The line in Diagram ................... is the most appropriate line of best fit
A cuboid has a square base
The volume of this cuboid is \(867 \mathrm{~cm}^3\) and its height is \(12 \mathrm{~cm}\)
Calculate the length of one side of the square base

The rhombus can be constructed by drawing two triangles
**Using a ruler and compasses only,** construct the rhombus
Leave in your construction arcs
One diagonal of the rhombus has been drawn for you
